article.headline: Texas Southern 65, Nicholls State 47
article.story: HOUSTON (AP)-- Sean Walker scored 16 points and Lionel Willis added 13 as Texas Southern beat cold-shooting Nicholls State 65-47 Saturday. Texas Southern (2-4) held Nicholls State (3-3) to just 23 percent shooting from the field. Willie Depron led Nicholls State with 25 points, six rebounds and five steals. He was 10-of-21 from the field, but the other four starters went 3-of-28. Only five other Nicholls State players scored, and Eric James was the second-leading scorer with six points. Texas Southern led 32-16 at halftime, after Nicholls State hit 18 percent from the field (6-of-33). Michael Sneed had nine rebounds for TSU, which outrebounded Nicholls State 47-37.
